line_1: Gives Pain or Pleasure, Grief or Laughter;
line_2: As We shall show at large hereafter.

line_1: Tea, says a Critic big with Laughter,
line_2: Was found some twenty Ages after:

line_1: Remarks, that so provoke one's Laughter,
line_2: One can't imagine what he's after:

line_1: Forbidding short liv'd mirth and laughter
line_2: By fears of what may come hereafter?

line_1: Fit subject or of scorn or laughter;
line_2: And makes one look so foolish after,
